content:
Hi, I was trying to make update to compiler-team website, but I keep getting errors when I run hugo

Seems like I can't even build the current master. Anyone have any ideas?

Didn't find anything useful on the internet

groups/rustc-dev-guide/_index.md:16:28": page not found
ERROR 2020/09/18 05:02:40 [en] REF_NOT_FOUND: Ref "/working-groups/rustc-dev-guide/minutes/2019.07.23-meeting": "/Users/me/Desktop/CourseWork/FYDP/compiler-team/content/working-groups/rustc-dev-guide/_index.md:17:28": page not found
ERROR 2020/09/18 05:02:40 [en] REF_NOT_FOUND: Ref "/working-groups/rustc-dev-guide/minutes/2019.08.06-meeting": "/Users/me/Desktop/CourseWork/FYDP/compiler-team/content/working-groups/rustc-dev-guide/_index.md:18:28": page not found
ERROR 2020/09/18 05:02:40 [en] REF_NOT_FOUND: Ref "/working-groups/rustc-dev-guide/minutes/2019.08.20-meeting": "/Users/me/Desktop/CourseWork/FYDP/compiler-team/content/working-groups/rustc-dev-guide/_index.md:19:28": page not found
ERROR 2020/09/18 05:02:40 [en] REF_NOT_FOUND: Ref "/working-groups/rustc-dev-guide/minutes/2019.09.17-meeting": "/Users/me/Desktop/CourseWork/FYDP/compiler-team/content/working-groups/rustc-dev-guide/_index.md:20:28": page not found
ERROR 2020/09/18 05:02:40 [en] REF_NOT_FOUND: Ref "/working-groups/polonius/minutes/2019.06.11-meeting": "/Users/me/Desktop/CourseWork/FYDP/compiler-team/content/working-groups/polonius/_index.md:32:28": page not found
website seems to be rendered with Hugo 0.56.3 maybe you should fallback to that version.

Just tried using hugo version 0.56.3 and it works. Should I try to upgrade to latest hugo version? Also you need extended version

We release two set of binaries for technical reasons. The extended version is not what you get by default for some installation methods. On the release page, look for archives with extended in the name. To build hugo-extended, use go install --tags extended

here is github releases link

I'm using the extended version

hugo version
Hugo Static Site Generator v0.75.1/extended darwin/amd64
Thanks 0.56.3 worked. The issue seems to be with the recent hugo, i'll try some different versions.
